T02D2627:236b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02D2627:236b-5: mchod pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa spangs pa dang /
T02D2627:236b-8: ri lu la sogs pa'i dngos grub gang yang rung
T02D2627:236b-9: ba dang ldan pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2627:236b-12: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa
T02D2627:236b-13: dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2627:236b-14: bya ba ni mdor bsdu na 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2627:236b-15: rten las 'das pa gnyis su bsdus pas de'i phan
T02D2627:236b-16: pa dang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2627:236b-17: ba'i don to // 'dis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po
T02D2627:236b-18: mchog sgom pa rnams kyi khang pa brtsegs ma dang
T02D2627:236b-20: kun rig sprul nas thugs kar zla ba la sngags bkod nas lha rnams sprul pa dang /
T02D2627:236b-21: sprul cing sgrub pa'i sngags 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan to //
T02D2627:236b-22: ri rab tu sprul ba'i dus ni /
T02D2627:236b-23: gtso bo grub pa'i dus su 'khor rnams grub pas /
T02D2627:236b-24: gtso bo dang 'khor sprul pa ma bstan to //
T02D2627:236b-25: de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te myong bar
T02D2627:236b-26: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dkyil
T02D2627:236b-27: 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to
T02D2627:236b-28: // de nas gtso bo dang tha mi dad par bsams te /
T02D2627:236b-29: bsdu ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D2627:236b-32: yang ched du brjod pa dang /
T02D2627:236b-36: kun gyi phrin las gcig la sbyar ba dang /
T02D2627:236b-37: kun gyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang /
T02D2627:236b-38: gsang zhing sra ba'i mchog mthon po las bstan pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02D2627:236b-39: las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2627:236b-40: / dam tshig dang dbang thob pas thabs 'di nyid la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2627:236b-41: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang ;
T02D2627:236b-42: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ston to //
T02D2627:236b-43: de nas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2627:236b-47: lha rnams grub nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:237a-0: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya @237a * //
T02D2627:237a-2: ci zhig byas nas she na /

T02D2627:237a-4: bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2627:237a-6: ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan
T02D2627:237a-7: pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang ci nas kyang
T02D2627:237a-8: sems can de dag ngan song thams cad kyi sgo
T02D2627:237a-9: las rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyid pa dang /

T02D2627:237a-11: byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad
T02D2627:237a-12: du zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bris pas mi
T02D2627:237a-13: rnams la phan pa'i don du ste de'i phyir bshad
T02D2627:237a-14: du gsol zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:237a-15: rje btsun bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni khyad par du bod pas gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02D2627:237a-16: de nas zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2627:237a-17: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2627:237a-18: kun rig nyid mi yul du sh'akya thub par gyur
T02D2627:237a-19: pa la dgongs nas de skad ces bshad de nges
T02D2627:237a-20: so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan
T02D2627:237a-21: song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes zhes
T02D2627:237a-22: bya ba ni der nges pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2627:237a-23: dbyer mi phyed pas rdo rje zhes bya la dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid de /
T02D2627:237a-24: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2627:237a-25: de'i snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa ste de mdzad nas so //
T02D2627:237a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams
T02D2627:237a-27: cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
T02D2627:237a-28: zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so
T02D2627:237a-29: zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor ni gzugs can dang gzugs
T02D2627:237a-30: med pa la gzugs med de rang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2627:237a-31: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2627:237a-32: de yang chos kyi bcud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i
T02D2627:237a-33: phyir dang snying po lan pa'i phyir de skad ces
T02D2627:237a-34: bya'o // chen po zhes bya ba ni chos kyi
T02D2627:237a-35: dbyings sngon du 'gro bas ye shes gzugs sku dang
T02D2627:237a-36: bya'o // bcas pa'o // 'di zhes bya ba 'og
T02D2627:237a-37: nas byung ba 'di'o gsungs so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2627:237a-38: bya'o // bcas pa'o // bka' stsal pa'o // gsungs pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2627:237a-39: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
T02D2627:237a-40: bla na med pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i //
T02D2627:237a-41: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang //
T02D2627:237a-42: de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
T02D2627:237a-44: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems /
T02D2627:237b-0: @237b zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2627:237b-1: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni spros pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2627:237b-2: rtogs 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba ni khong du chud pa'o //
T02D2627:237b-3: de nyid ye shes zhes bya bas ston te sus gsungs she na /
T02D2627:237b-4: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D2627:237b-5: de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
T02D2627:237b-6: zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste de nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:237b-7: dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02D2627:237b-8: rang bzhin du bshad pa de yang 'di yin te /
T02D2627:237b-9: mi mnyam pa med pas zur bzhi yin no //
T02D2627:237b-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T02D2627:237b-11: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2627:237b-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang /
T02D2627:237b-13: dbang po lnga zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi yin no //
T02D2627:237b-14: bsam gtan rnams la rta babs bzhi //
T02D2627:237b-16: gzugs rnams la kha khyer la brten pa'i lha mo rnams zhes bya'o //
T02D2627:237b-17: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'dul ba bskyod pa'i rang bzhin ni /
T02D2627:237b-18: rlung gis dar 'phan bskyod nas sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2627:237b-19: ye shes me long zhes bya'o //
T02D2627:237b-20: byang chub kyi yan lag me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2627:237b-21: mi zad pa'i bde ba dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
T02D2627:237b-22: rin chen mchog nyi ma dang zla ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2627:237b-23: rnam par thar pa brgyad dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya'o //
T02D2627:237b-24: theg pa chen po mdo sdes bskor ba ni rdo rje theg pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2627:237b-25: 'khor lo ni chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
T02D2627:237b-27: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi ste //
T02D2627:237b-28: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi yin //
T02D2627:237b-29: bsam gtan rnams kyang rta babs yin //
T02D2627:237b-30: kha khyer la brten rdo rje mchog / lha mos mchod pas gzungs rnams yin //
T02D2627:237b-31: sna tshogs pa yi rgyan rnams kun //
T02D2627:237b-32: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pa yin //
T02D2627:237b-33: gdul bya bskyod pas sna tshogs mchog / dam chos mchog ni kun du 'gro //
T02D2627:237b-34: rlung gis bskyod nas sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgra sgrogs ni //
T02D2627:237b-35: me long ye shes rtags me tog / dra ba
T02D2627:237b-36: dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla ba
T02D2627:237b-37: yang dag ldan // kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02D2627:237b-38: bde ba chen po zhas bshad do //
T02D2627:237b-39: de yi nang rim dag gi thig / dkyil 'khor brgyad pa 'dra pha ni //
T02D2627:237b-40: 'di na rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02D2627:237b-41: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster //
T02D2627:237b-42: theg pa chen po byang chub sems //
T02D2627:238a-2: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba //
T02D2627:238a-3: rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri //
T02D2627:238a-6: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2627:238a-8: sems can gyi don la chags pa dang /
T02D2627:238a-9: byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu bar byed pa'i tshul ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2627:238a-14: byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni //
T02D2627:238a-15: sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang //
T02D2627:238a-16: de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin //

T02D2627:238a-24: sems can smin phyir bcom ldan gyis //

T02D2627:238a-26: byang chub spyod la rjes chags pa //
T02D2627:238a-27: rdo rje chags par yang dag 'byung //

T02D2627:238a-31: byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed //
T02D2627:238a-32: de ni rdo rje legs par brjod //
T02D2627:238a-34: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid sbyin pa'i
T02D2627:238a-35: pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi shes pa'i mun
T02D2627:238a-37: chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po dang /

T02D2627:238a-40: rgyal mtshan dang bzhad pa bzhi yin te /
T02D2627:238a-42: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang //
T02D2627:238a-43: mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste //
T02D2627:238a-44: rdo rje rin chen skal ba che //
T02D2627:238a-45: des na rdo rje rin chen brjod //
T02D2627:238a-47: ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi //
T02D2627:238a-48: mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing //
T02D2627:238a-49: thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che //
T02D2627:238a-50: de ni rdo rje gzi brjid do //
T02D2627:238a-52: rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02D2627:238a-53: thar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan de //
T02D2627:238a-54: chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che //
T02D2627:238a-55: de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod //
T02D2627:238a-57: rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad //
T02D2627:238a-58: sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing //

T02D2627:238b-4: dang / shes rab chen po dang /

T02D2627:238b-10: rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos //

T02D2627:238b-15: shes rab rnon po ye shes che //
T02D2627:238b-16: shin tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod //
T02D2627:238b-17: shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pas na //

T02D2627:238b-20: 'khor lo sangs rgyas gar shes pa //

T02D2627:238b-43: theg pa dman pa spang byed cing //
T02D2627:238b-44: rtse mo nas ltung srung byed pa //

T02D2627:238b-46: sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing //
T02D2627:238b-47: nyon mongs thams cad nges par gcod //

T02D2627:238b-56: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang /
T02D2627:239a-2: gandhe zhes bya ba rnams so //
T02D2627:239a-4: gang phyir mchog tu rol pas na //

T02D2627:239a-17: sangs rgyas nyid 'bras rgyu yin pas //

T02D2627:239a-20: rdo rje mar me thabs chen po //

T02D2627:239a-25: / byang chub kyi spyod pa'i zhags pa dang theg pa chen por 'ching ba dang /

T02D2627:239a-32: byang chub sems kyis 'gugs pa ni //
T02D2627:239a-33: rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag brjod //
T02D2627:239a-34: byang chub spyod pa la spyod pa //

T02D2627:239a-36: theg pa dman pa srung byed pa //
T02D2627:239a-37: rdo rje lcags sgrog de bshad do //

T02D2627:239a-53: btang snyoms che dang thabs che bar //

T02D2627:239a-56: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2627:239a-59: byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba bzhi go rims bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba dang /
T02D2627:239b-0: byang @239b chub tu ni sems bskyed dang //
T02D2627:239b-1: de bzhin tshogs dang shes rab dang //
T02D2627:239b-2: byang chub spyod pa rab spyod pa //
T02D2627:239b-3: rgyal po bzhir ni yang dag 'byung //

T02D2627:239b-8: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad ces //
T02D2627:239b-9: chos rnams gcig tu bsdus pa yin //
T02D2627:239b-11: 'dis ni 'bras bu de nyid las ldog pa'i tshul
T02D2627:239b-12: gyis tha dad pa yin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D2627:239b-13: tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //

T02D2627:239b-16: kho na nyid thog mar shes par gyis shig ces

T02D2627:239b-20: yang zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'o //

T02D2627:239b-22: brtse ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni mi rnams
T02D2627:239b-24: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni //

T02D2627:239b-27: mi rnams la phan pa'i don du bshad do //

T02D2627:239b-33: mchod rten dang lha khang dang kun dga' ra ba dang 'bab chu'i 'gram dang /
T02D2627:239b-35: byang gi phyogs kyi char ram gang du yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D2627:239b-37: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i don du ni //
T02D2627:239b-38: tshigs bcad 'di ni bsgrag par bya //
T02D2627:239b-39: sa la rgyu ba'i lha kun dang //
T02D2627:239b-40: gang zhig sa la brtan pa kun //
T02D2627:239b-41: byams pa'i sems kyis gnas nas su //
T02D2627:239b-42: sems can kun la dge don du //
T02D2627:239b-43: kun dga'i don du zhu zhing mchis //
T02D2627:239b-44: de nas ji ltar 'tsham bzhin du pus mo nub tsam 'og tu brkos la /
T02D2627:239b-45: gyo mo la sogs pa bsal la /
T02D2627:239b-46: spyan dang rdo re gnod sbyin dang //
T02D2627:239b-47: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyi chus bsang gtor bya //
T02D2627:240a-2: ba'i chu dang lci bas byug / sa gzung ba dang sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2627:240a-3: de nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan /
T02D2627:240a-5: rdo rje gnod sbyin du bskyed /
T02D2627:240a-6: mig gnyis su ma dang ta las zla ba dang nyi ma dgod /
T02D2627:240a-7: rkang pa la aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed /
T02D2627:240a-8: lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu bzang ste yi ge h'um gi sgra sgrogs shing /
T02D2627:240a-9: g-yas nas bskor la dengs zhes brjod /
T02D2627:240a-10: mtshams dang ra ba dang dra ba dag kyang bya /
T02D2627:240a-11: bdud dang sdang ba bzlog / de nas phur bu byin gyis brlabs la phur bu gdab par bya'o //
T02D2627:240a-13: ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis //
T02D2627:240a-15: de nas sbyor ba dang po dang /
T02D2627:240a-17: las rgyal mchog bsgoms la dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg //
T02D2627:240a-18: lha'i gnas su tsandan la sogs pa'i zlum po dang /
T02D2627:240a-21: lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug gzhug bya /
T02D2627:240a-25: sgo bcad srung ba brtan par bya /
T02D2627:240a-26: mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab /
T02D2627:240a-27: mchod pa rnams kyis mchod rang rang gi sngags ci mang du bzlas te /
T02D2627:240a-28: bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D2627:240a-29: phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin pa dang /
T02D2627:240a-32: mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa la sogs bya'o //
T02D2627:240a-34: gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam //
T02D2627:240a-35: zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02D2627:240a-36: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni //
T02D2627:240a-37: zhes bya ba ni de nyid du'o //
T02D2627:240a-38: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D2627:240a-39: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo gnyis pa'o //
T02D2627:240a-40: phyogs kun mnyam pa grva dang bcas pas gru bzhi
T02D2627:240a-41: pa la phyogs kyi cha re re zhing sgo bzhi
T02D2627:240a-42: yod pas sgo bzhi pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2627:240a-43: rta babs bzhi dag ldan pa dang //
T02D2627:240a-44: them skas bzhi yi phreng ba dang //
T02D2627:240a-45: seng ge ba glang rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2627:240a-47: phyogs re re na rta babs re dang /
T02D2627:240a-49: seng ge ba glang rnams kyis mdzes par byas pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2627:240a-50: dar dang lnga ldi do shal phreng //
T02D2627:240a-51: dril bu dang ni rdza mas brgyan //
T02D2627:240b-0: zhes bya ba @240b ni dar gyi lnga ldi dang /
T02D2627:240b-1: mu tig gi do shal dang /
T02D2627:240b-2: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2627:240b-3: dril bu g-yer kha la sogs pa dag /
T02D2627:240b-4: rnga mas mdzes par byas pa la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2627:240b-5: rdo rje rin chen padma dang //
T02D2627:240b-6: rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan //
T02D2627:240b-7: zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs su rdo rje /
T02D2627:240b-10: byang du rgya gram gyi phyag rgyas brgyan cing sprul pa'o //
T02D2627:240b-11: srang bu rgyan dang ldan pa dang //
T02D2627:240b-12: phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2627:240b-13: zhes bya ba ni tshangs thig gnyis dang /
T02D2627:240b-18: lho phyogs kyi thig ste brgyad dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2627:240b-19: sgo khyud ni mdzes pa dang /
T02D2627:240b-20: rjes su mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni rtsig par
T02D2627:240b-21: ston pa'i cha gnyis te de rnams kyis brgyan pa'o
T02D2627:240b-22: // dgu yi char ni bgos pa las //
T02D2627:240b-23: zhes bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gnas gru
T02D2627:240b-24: bzhi pa cha dgu dang ldan par bgos pa la
T02D2627:240b-25: so // sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya //
T02D2627:240b-26: zhes bya ba ni sgo dang sgo khyud la cha
T02D2627:240b-27: chen gcig gnas par byas pas sum cha'i yang su
T02D2627:240b-29: rdo rje srad bus thig gdab po //
T02D2627:240b-30: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srang bur byin gyis brlabs pas gdab bo //
T02D2627:240b-31: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
T02D2627:240b-32: zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi yang dbus kyi thig gdab pa'o //
T02D2627:240b-33: chos kyi 'khor lo dra ba la //
T02D2627:240b-34: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang mtshon cha'i 'khor
T02D2627:240b-35: lo lta bu ma yin pa chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D2627:240b-36: 'dra ba'o // yang na lte ba dang rtsibs rten
T02D2627:240b-37: dang rtsibs dang gsum chos kyi 'khor lo gsum dang
T02D2627:240b-38: 'dra ba'o // 'dra ba'o // yang na stong pa
T02D2627:240b-39: nyid bcu drug chos yin la de yang 'khor lo
T02D2627:240b-41: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / ces bya
T02D2627:240b-44: rtsibs bcu drug tu grangs nges pa'o //
T02D2627:240b-45: rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la //
T02D2627:240b-46: zhes bya ba'i lte ba'i rim pa dang /
T02D2627:240b-47: rtsibs rten gyi rim pa dang /
T02D2627:240b-48: rtsibs kyi rim pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2627:240b-49: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya ;
T02D2627:240b-51: rtsibs byang chub sems dpa'i gnas yin pas gtso bo'i
T02D2627:240b-52: gnas pas nyis 'gyur gyis chung bar bya'o zhes bya
T02D2627:240b-53: ba'i don to // yang lte ba la bskor ba'i rim pa dang po ni rtsibs rten no //
T02D2627:240b-54: gnyis pa ni rtsibs yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2627:240b-55: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //
T02D2627:241a-2: /'di ni don slar yang gsal bar bya ste /
T02D2627:241a-3: sa yi cha yid du 'ong bar dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyi tshad la /
T02D2627:241a-4: mig byin gyis brlab cing bsgril ba dang rang rdo rje sems dpar bskyed de /
T02D2627:241a-5: grogs po rdo rje las su bskyed nas /
T02D2627:241a-6: dang po rang shar du bltas te tshangs thig gdab /
T02D2627:241a-7: de'i 'og tu byang du bltas te tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab /
T02D2627:241a-8: me'i gnas su gnas la shar gyi thig gdab /
T02D2627:241a-9: rlung gi phyogs su bltas te nub kyi thig kyang gdab /
T02D2627:241a-10: nyid nyid du 'dug ste shar du bltas te byang du thig kyang gdab /
T02D2627:241a-11: me'i mtshams su gnas nas lho phyogs kyi thig gdab /
T02D2627:241a-12: de nyid du 'dug ste rlung phyogs su bltas te tshangs thig gdab par bya /
T02D2627:241a-13: bde bral gyi phyogs su 'dug ste dbang ldan du kha bltas la zur thig gnyis pa gdab /
T02D2627:241a-14: de ltar gu bzhir gnas pa la cha chen bcu drug gdab par bya'o //
T02D2627:241a-15: tha mar cha chen gnyis par bya'o //
T02D2627:241a-16: dbus kyi bcu po gnyis gnyis gdab /
T02D2627:241a-17: nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag tu 'gyur //
T02D2627:241a-18: de nas cha phra mo gdab par bya ba ni /
T02D2627:241a-19: cha chen dgu ru gnas pa la //
T02D2627:241a-20: tha mar lnga ba'i phyed bor ba la lhag ma
T02D2627:241a-21: brgyad la bzhi bzhir bgo gsum pa dang de bzhin
T02D2627:241a-22: du lnga pa la yang ngo //
T02D2627:241a-23: phyi rol gyi sgo dang nang gi sgo khyud dang logs su 'gyur ro//
T02D2627:241a-24: lnga pa'i phyed nang du bor nas phyi rol gnyis su gdab /
T02D2627:241a-25: drug pa la cha bran bzhi btab la bdun pa'i nang rol cha chung gcig gdab bo //
T02D2627:241a-27: dgu pa dang bcu pa bcu gnyis pa bcu gnyis pa bzhi bzhir gdab bo //
T02D2627:241a-28: de nas tshon gyi thig gdab par bya ste /
T02D2627:241a-29: lnga pa phyed kyi dang po gdab ;
T02D2627:241a-30: / de nas gnyis dor gsum pa gdab //
T02D2627:241a-31: drug pa la yang gdab par bya //
T02D2627:241a-32: dgu pa'i nang gi cha gcig gdab //
T02D2627:241a-33: yang gnyis dor la cha gcig gdab //
T02D2627:241a-34: yang gnyis bzhag la cha gcig gdab //
T02D2627:241a-35: ngos dang 'gram ma dang ya phugs 'gyur //
T02D2627:241a-36: lhag ma ni ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2627:241a-37: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa la /
T02D2627:241a-38: tshangs thig gi phyogs gcig tu bcu gnyis pa yongs su bskor bas rtsibs rten du 'gyur ro //
T02D2627:241a-39: de'i nang du phyogs gcig gi bzhi pa btab bas ka bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2627:241a-40: rtsibs rten gyi phyir rol gsum dor ba la rtsibs drug tu bya ste /
T02D2627:241b-0: gtso bo'i gnas pas phyed kyis @241b chung ba nyis 'gyur du bya'o /
T02D2627:241b-1: bzhi pa yongs su bskor bas rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2627:241b-3: dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig gi //
T02D2627:241b-5: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi phyogs su
T02D2627:241b-6: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kha dog dung
T02D2627:241b-7: dang kunda dang / zla ba dang 'dra ba la mchog tu phul du byung ba'o //
T02D2627:241b-8: dbyibs dang gdan dang rgyan ci zhig ce na /
T02D2627:241b-9: zhal bzhi pa la dro rje yi //
T02D2627:241b-10: seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang /
T02D2627:241b-11: ting nge 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang //
T02D2627:241b-12: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri //
T02D2627:241b-15: zhal bzhi pa la zhes bya ba sku gcig la zhal bzhi'o /
T02D2627:241b-16: de yang 'og nas de'i spyan sngar ngan song kun 'dren shar phyogs la gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2627:241b-17: seng ge'i gdan la zhes pa seng ge dang padma dang zla ba la'o //
T02D2627:241b-18: rdo rje'i bzhugs pa dang zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2627:241b-19: 'dis ni rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs par bstan te //
T02D2627:241b-20: ting 'dzin phyag rgya ldan pa dang //
T02D2627:241b-21: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri //
T02D2627:241b-22: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya
T02D2627:241b-23: dang dbu rgyan la sogs pas brgyan par bri ba
T02D2627:241b-24: dang / gzhan pa dang dgod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:241b-25: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i spyan sngar te /
T02D2627:241b-26: shar du ngan song kun sbyong ba'i rgyal po bri
T02D2627:241b-27: ste phyag gnyis ting nge 'dzin du bsnol ba kha
T02D2627:241b-28: dog ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2627:241b-29: zla brgyas dang ba mo'i mdog / rgyan ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2627:241b-30: rgyan rnams kun gyis lags rdzogs la //
T02D2627:241b-31: rgyal mtshon skyes bu gang ba bri //
T02D2627:241b-33: rgyal mchog gang bas mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin gyis brgyan par bstan la /
T02D2627:241b-34: snga mas ni gsal ba'i rgyan ston to //
T02D2627:241b-35: rgyab tu sh'akya'i rigs dbang po //
T02D2627:241b-36: gtso bo thub pa bri bar bya //
T02D2627:241b-37: zhes bya ba ni nub kyi phyogs su sh'akya thub
T02D2627:241b-38: pa kha dog dmar po chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag
T02D2627:241b-40: g-yon dang g-yas kyi phyogs char ni //
T02D2627:241b-41: rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis //
T02D2627:241b-42: zhes bya ba ni lho dang byang du'o //
T02D2627:241b-43: rin chen po me tog kha dog sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can dang /
T02D2627:241b-44: byang phyogs su me tog cher rgyas kha dog ljang
T02D2627:241b-45: gu mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya can bri zhing dgod
T02D2627:241b-46: par bya'o // 'di dag gi gdam yang glang po
T02D2627:241b-47: che la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa bzhin
T02D2627:242a-2: / lo tsa na dang m'a ma k'i //
T02D2627:242a-3: de bzhin gos dkar sgrol ma rnams //
T02D2627:242a-4: rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin //
T02D2627:242a-5: grva yi phyogs ni kun du bri //
T02D2627:242a-10: sgrol ma rnams rang gi rigs gtso bo'i kha dog dang mtshan ma can dang /
T02D2627:242a-13: autpala rnams go rims bzhin du phyag g-yas na 'dzin cing /
T02D2627:242a-14: grva'i phyogs kun du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:242a-15: rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du //
T02D2627:242a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog / rdzu 'phrul che ba'i sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2627:242a-17: go rims bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02D2627:242a-18: zhes bya ba ni rtsibs bcu drug pa'i nang thams
T02D2627:242a-19: cad du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'bras
T02D2627:242a-20: bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams
T02D2627:242a-21: dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te go rims bzhin
T02D2627:242a-22: du bri bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:242a-23: mkhas pas l'a sye la sogs pa //
T02D2627:242a-24: mchod pa grva yi phyogs su bri //
T02D2627:242a-25: zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi mdog dang //
T02D2627:242a-26: dbyibs la bya bas l'a skye la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad nang gi grva dang /
T02D2627:242a-27: phyi rol gyi grvar bri zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:242a-28: sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
T02D2627:242a-29: zhes bya ba ni shar la sogs pa bzhir /
T02D2627:242a-30: sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya //
T02D2627:242a-32: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
T02D2627:242a-33: zhes bya ba ni kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:242a-35: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi gnas dang /
T02D2627:242a-36: nang gi khyams nyid kyi nang du bri zhes bya ba ste bstan pa'o //
T02D2627:242a-38: byams pa la sogs bri bar bya //
T02D2627:242a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te nang gi
T02D2627:242a-40: khyams nyid du byams pa la sogs pa bcu drug
T02D2627:242a-41: bri bar bya'o // rta babs kyi gnas kyi khyams la /
T02D2627:242a-42: rim pa gsum gyi rang bzhin bri //
T02D2627:242a-43: zhes te dang po la 'khor ba gcod mdzad la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o //
T02D2627:242a-45: nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang //
T02D2627:242a-47: nyid kyi gcung tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o //
T02D2627:242a-48: gsum pa la nyon mongs 'joms pa 'jigs med gdung
T02D2627:242a-49: ba sel ba la sogs pa bcu gnyis bri bar
T02D2627:242a-50: bya'o // khro bo mngag pa pho nya rnams //
T02D2627:242a-51: bri bya yang na ming yang rung //
T02D2627:242a-52: zhes bya ba ni khro bo nyid mngag pa yang
T02D2627:242b-0: yin la pho nya yang yin pas @242b de skad
T02D2627:242b-1: ces bya'o // bri'am yang na ming yang rung //
T02D2627:242b-2: zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba'am ming de yi ger
T02D2627:242b-3: dgod pa'ang rung ste phyag mtshan du dgod par bya
T02D2627:242b-5: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal bo mchog bsgom pa ston to //
T02D2627:242b-6: shar phyogs kyi sgor 'jig rten gsum snang dang 'jig rten gsum 'jig go ;
T02D2627:242b-7: / lho phyogs kyi sgor 'jig rten gsum mthar byed dang 'jig rten gsum 'dul lo //
T02D2627:242b-8: nub phyogs kyi sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /
T02D2627:242b-10: byang phyogs kyi sgor mi g-yo mgon po dang rta mgrin bri bar bya'o //
T02D2627:242b-11: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02D2627:242b-12: zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa de nyid kyi phyi rol du mu ran dkar po bri zhing /
T02D2627:242b-14: gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya //
T02D2627:242b-15: 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri //
T02D2627:242b-16: byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug che //
T02D2627:242b-17: shar dang nub kyi gling du ni //
T02D2627:242b-18: brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad kyang //
T02D2627:242b-19: 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya //
T02D2627:242b-21: shar phyogs su brgya byin 'khor dang bcas /
T02D2627:242b-22: lho phyogs su tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas /
T02D2627:242b-23: nub phyogs su gtog 'dod 'khor dang bcas /
T02D2627:242b-24: byang phyogs su ma h'a de ba 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:242b-25: gzhan rnams dag kyang de bzhin te //
T02D2627:242b-27: brgya byin nas brtsams te dbang ldan gyi mthar thug par 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2627:242b-28: de nyid kyi 'khor bshad pa lha min zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2627:242b-29: lha min zhes bya ba sum brtsegs dang /
T02D2627:242b-32: kun du snang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2627:242b-33: dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la sogs pa'o //
T02D2627:242b-34: nam mkha' lding gser mig la sogs pa'o //
T02D2627:242b-35: gnod sbyin nor 'dzin la sogs pa'o //
T02D2627:242b-36: srin po au ba karni pu rnal sogs pa'o //
T02D2627:242b-37: gzhan yang de bzhin du lto 'phye chen po dang /
T02D2627:242b-43: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang /
T02D2627:242b-46: khro bo ma rungs pa 'tshe ba'i bgegs dang /
T02D2627:242b-47: bi na ya ka rnams dang /
T02D2627:242b-48: sems can kun la phan par byed ba'i dang srong skal ba chen po rnams dang /
T02D2627:242b-49: mkha' 'gro ma'i bud med rnams dang /
T02D2627:242b-50: srin po rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
T02D2627:242b-51: 'byung po bzhi'i lha chen po rnams dang /
T02D2627:243a-4: dur khrod na gnas pa dang /
T02D2627:243a-5: grong khyer na gnas pa rnams kyang bri ste ming du gzhag pa dang /
T02D2627:243a-7: thig le tsam du bri bar bya ste /
T02D2627:243a-8: 'khor 'di rnams kyi kha dog la sogs ma bshad do//

T02D2627:249a-42: bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang //

T02D2627:249a-44: zhes bya ba mchog gi mtshan ma dang /
T02D2627:249a-45: de bzhin dge slong bram zhe dang //
T02D2627:249a-46: zhes bya ba'i 'bring gi mtshan ma dang /
T02D2627:249a-47: 'bras bu mthong na zhes bya ba mtshan ma tha
T02D2627:249a-48: ma las go rims bzhin du myur du mchog dang
T02D2627:249a-49: bar dang tha mar 'grub ces bya'o //
T02D2627:249a-50: de nas gzugs de zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2627:249a-51: bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa dang dngos grub ston te
T02D2627:249a-52: / gzugs byin gyis brlabs te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2627:249a-53: ye shes sems dpa' bcug pas so //
T02D2627:249b-0: @249b sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2627:249b-1: ci bdog pa yis mchod par bya //
T02D2627:249b-2: rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang //
T02D2627:249b-3: zhes bya ba ni mchod ba sna tshogs kyis mchod cing /
T02D2627:249b-4: rnal 'byor gyis dus su rgyun mi 'chad par spyan sngar 'dug ces ston to //
T02D2627:249b-5: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis //
T02D2627:249b-6: bdag srung la sogs byas nas kyang //
T02D2627:249b-7: bdag gi de nyid dran byed cing //
T02D2627:249b-8: zhes bya ba ni h'um bzhi'i sngags kyis bdag srung ba dang /
T02D2627:249b-9: khrus kyi cho ga sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D2627:249b-10: dkyil 'khor lus la brtags pa'i mthar thug pa byas la 'bum phrag gsum mam yang na drug /
T02D2627:249b-11: dngos grub mtshan ma ma byung bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2627:249b-12: de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni //
T02D2627:249b-13: brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya //
T02D2627:249b-16: gnas dben par snga ma nyid kyi chogs brgyad brgyar sngags gug skyed dang /
T02D2627:249b-17: tsheg bar la sogs pa chad lhag med bar bzlas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:249b-18: de ltar bsnyen pa bstan nas /
T02D2627:249b-19: de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni //
T02D2627:249b-20: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la //
T02D2627:249b-21: mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang //
T02D2627:249b-22: mtshan gcig thog thab bzlas pa bya //
T02D2627:249b-23: zhes bya bas sgrub pa bstan te /
T02D2627:249b-24: bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i mjug tu dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bsams la /
T02D2627:249b-25: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas 'bras bu bstan pa ste /
T02D2627:249b-26: ci ste gtso bo'am de yi sras //
T02D2627:249b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
T02D2627:249b-28: ci ste gtso bo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D2627:249b-29: 'jig rten pa mthong ba las dngos grub rab 'bring
T02D2627:249b-30: gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2627:249b-31: phyag 'tshal nas dngos grub blang bar bya'o //
T02D2627:249b-32: gal te 'bring ngam tha ma'i dngos grub mig sman
T02D2627:249b-33: la sogs pa yin na bla ma dang dkon mchog
T02D2627:249b-34: la skal ba re re phul nas lhag ma bdag
T02D2627:249b-35: spyad / dbul ba'i zhing med na bdag nyid kyis spyad /
T02D2627:249b-36: mchog gi dngos grub yin na /
T02D2627:249b-37: sems can la phan par brtson par bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2627:249b-38: ci ste dngos grub 'thob na las thams cad 'grub par gyur te /
T02D2627:249b-39: gnod sbyin rgyu skar gdon la sogs pa tshig tsam
T02D2627:249b-40: gyis bran bzhin du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D2627:249b-41: byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:250a-1: byas pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang
T02D2627:250a-2: du gyur pa thabs sla bas grol ba bstan pa'i
T02D2627:250a-3: phyir / de nas zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D2627:250a-4: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2627:250a-5: bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal
T02D2627:250a-6: ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams ji
T02D2627:250a-7: ltar na dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ba'i
T02D2627:250a-8: spang ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyis zhes bya ba
T02D2627:250a-9: ni shi ba rnams ji ltar sbyang zhes pa'i don
T02D2627:250a-10: to // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D2627:250a-11: lha'i dbang po nyon cig ; sems can dmyal ba
T02D2627:250a-12: la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig
T02D2627:250a-13: pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang
T02D2627:250a-14: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thabs sla bas
T02D2627:250a-15: grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig ces bya ba ni
T02D2627:250a-16: nyon la zung shig pa'i don to //
T02D2627:250a-18: de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
T02D2627:250a-19: de ltar yang na bum pa la //
T02D2627:250a-20: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni //
T02D2627:250a-21: dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag / ces bya ba sngar bshad pa bzhin du /
T02D2627:250a-22: bsnyen pa dang sa'i cho ga dang /
T02D2627:250a-23: lha rnams mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2627:250a-24: bum pa la sngags bzlas te /
T02D2627:250a-25: lho sgo'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor
T02D2627:250a-26: du bcug cing sngar bshad pa bzhin du dbang bskur
T02D2627:250a-27: ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:250a-29: de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te //
T02D2627:250a-30: dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las //
T02D2627:250a-31: de ni myur du thar par 'gyur //
T02D2627:250a-32: sdig las rnam par grol bdag nyid //
T02D2627:250a-33: dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi ;
T02D2627:250a-34: / rigs su skye bar gyur nas kyang //
T02D2627:250a-35: de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2627:250a-37: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas //
T02D2627:250a-40: de yang ci zhig las dbang bskur zhe na /
T02D2627:250a-41: de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba ni //
T02D2627:250a-42: gur gum gyis ni ming byang rus //
T02D2627:250a-45: ngan song kun gyi 'jigs chen las //
T02D2627:250a-46: sems can rnams ni dgrol ba'i phyir //
T02D2627:250a-49: sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing //
T02D2627:250a-50: snying rje can gyis dang bskur ro //
T02D2627:250b-1: des ni thabs dang po bstan to //
T02D2627:250b-3: de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni //
T02D2627:250b-4: sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur //
T02D2627:250b-5: lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang //
T02D2627:250b-6: mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya //
T02D2627:250b-7: zhes bya ba ni gzugs brnyan la sogs pa mdun du gzhag la /
T02D2627:250b-8: lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlab pa nas bzung ste srung ba'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D2627:250b-9: nam mkhar dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang mchod pa rnams kyis mchod de /
T02D2627:250b-10: ji lta ba'i go rims kyis mngon par byang chub pa mngon du byas nas /
T02D2627:250b-11: phab ste dkyil 'khor bsre ba byas la gzugs brnyan
T02D2627:250b-12: la sogs pa la 'od zer gyis shes pa bcug
T02D2627:250b-13: ste / sdig pa 'joms pa la sogs sngon du
T02D2627:250b-14: 'gro bas rang gi snying gar ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2627:250b-15: ste / du bcug ste / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2627:250b-16: sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te mchod rten gyi
T02D2627:250b-17: dbus su gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2627:250b-20: rang gi lha'am lha gzhan gyi //
T02D2627:250b-21: snying po snying gar bris nas kyang //
T02D2627:250b-22: lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de //
T02D2627:250b-23: khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya //
T02D2627:250b-24: zhes bya ba ni dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba shi bar gyur na /
T02D2627:250b-25: shes na rang gi lha'i snying po snying gar bri /
T02D2627:250b-26: lha dang 'dra bas sems kyis brtag / ma shes
T02D2627:250b-27: na lhag gang yang rung ba'i snying po snying gar
T02D2627:250b-28: bri / lha dang 'dra bas sems kyis brtag /
T02D2627:250b-29: khyim mam dur khrod dam mchod pa'i nang du mchod
T02D2627:250b-30: pa'i nang du gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2627:250b-31: 'di ni thabs sla ba gsum pa'o //

T02D2627:250b-36: mchod rten las ni rab tu bya //
T02D2627:250b-37: sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir //
T02D2627:250b-38: bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya //
T02D2627:250b-39: de nas ni nges par dmyal gnas nas //

T02D2627:250b-42: // yi dags byol song sdug bsngal las //
T02D2627:250b-43: grol nas lha yi nang du skye //
T02D2627:250b-47: aom sarba bid ces bya ba nas /

T02D2627:250b-49: pos ras sam gro gnag por byas pa la 'bum
T02D2627:250b-50: tshang bar tsee tya byas te /
T02D2627:250b-52: sdig pa zad par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2627:250b-53: bye ba snyed du gdab par bya'o //

T02D2627:251a-7: brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang //
T02D2627:251a-8: bye ba snyed du rab bzlas na //
T02D2627:251a-9: lha yi gnas su skye bar nges //

T02D2627:251a-12: sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas de'i ming thog mar smos te /
T02D2627:251a-13: gong du bshad pa'i sngags 'bum phrag stong dang brgya phrag stong tshang ba dang /
T02D2627:251a-14: bye ba snyed du bzlas te dkyil 'khor chen po

T02D2627:251a-17: ba'i don to // thabs sla ba lnga pa'o //
T02D2627:251a-19: de yi ming nas brjod nas ni //
T02D2627:251a-21: yang na stong phrag brgya snyed du //
T02D2627:251a-22: sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni //
T02D2627:251a-24: thab khung ji lta ba bzhin du brkos te /
T02D2627:251a-25: rdzas gzhag cing bsang ba byas nas rang lhar bskyed de /
T02D2627:251a-26: chos kyi yi ge las thab khung byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2627:251a-27: bha dang sha bkod ba'i bud shing brtsigs te rgyun
T02D2627:251a-28: bzhag gi me sbar nas me lha spyan drang ba
T02D2627:251a-29: sngon du 'gro bas dgang blugs la sogs pa phul
T02D2627:251a-30: te 'bar ba dang tha mi dad par 'gyur pa'i

T02D2627:251a-32: rje sems dpa' la dgang blugs la sogs pa phul
T02D2627:251a-33: ba sngags dang ming spel te /
T02D2627:251a-34: til gyi sbyin sreg mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am /
T02D2627:251a-35: brgya phrag stong snyed du sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D2627:251a-36: lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga byas nas ni zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:251a-38: dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi //

T02D2627:251a-41: yang dus ji srid du zhe na //
T02D2627:251a-42: ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni //
T02D2627:251a-44: mtshan ma yang dag 'byung bar du //
T02D2627:251a-45: zhes bya ba de srid du'o //
T02D2627:251a-47: til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang //
T02D2627:251a-48: ba yi 'o mar ldan pa dang /
T02D2627:251a-49: dri yis bskus pa'i yam shing gis //
T02D2627:251a-50: cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2627:251a-52: sdig pa las thar ba'i mtshan ma ni /
T02D2627:251b-0: de nas de ni @251b nges par yang //
T02D2627:251b-1: lha yi gnas su skyes gyur nas //
T02D2627:251b-2: de yi mtshan ma ston par byed //
T02D2627:251b-3: yang na lha yi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2627:251b-4: yang na hom khung nang du ni //
T02D2627:251b-5: me yi ltas ni ston byed cing //
T02D2627:251b-6: lha yi gnas su skye ba dang //
T02D2627:251b-7: sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan ma ni //
T02D2627:251b-8: dkar po nyid dang g-yas su 'bar //
T02D2627:251b-9: gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med //
T02D2627:251b-10: zlum zhing rnam par mi 'phro la //
T02D2627:251b-11: brtan la glog bzhin dri ma med //
T02D2627:251b-12: yang na me lha nyid kyis ni //
T02D2627:251b-13: bdag nyid de nyid ston byed cing //
T02D2627:251b-15: gzhan mdog dkar zhing lham mer 'bar //
T02D2627:251b-16: des na mtshan ma 'di dag gis //
T02D2627:251b-17: dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing //
T02D2627:251b-18: sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni //
T02D2627:251b-19: skyes pa yin par shes par bya //
T02D2627:251b-20: zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i mtshan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:251b-23: khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni //
T02D2627:251b-24: cho ga bzhin du brkos pa la //
T02D2627:251b-25: rdo rjes mtha' mar bskor ba yi //
T02D2627:251b-26: 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya //

T02D2627:251b-28: ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri //
T02D2627:251b-29: ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams kyang ni //
T02D2627:251b-30: 'jig rten rtse la sogs pa bri //
T02D2627:251b-31: zhes bya ba ni dang por stegs bu'i tshad khru sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa brtsigs la /
T02D2627:251b-32: khru bzhi ba'i smad du zabs su khru do ba'i tshad kyi khung bu brkos la /
T02D2627:251b-33: sor bcu drug pa'i phyi rol du sor bcu drug
T02D2627:251b-34: yod pa'i mtho dman dang ldan pa de la rdo
T02D2627:251b-35: rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng bas bskor /

T02D2627:251b-37: lte ba la sogs pa rnams su rigs lnga'i phyag
T02D2627:251b-38: rgya rnams shar la sogs pa ji bzhin pa'i phyogs
T02D2627:251b-39: su rim pa bzhin du bri /
T02D2627:251b-40: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa /

T02D2627:251b-42: de'i phyi rol grva dang sgo rnams la /

T02D2627:251b-44: khyams kyi nang du byams pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bri /
T02D2627:251b-45: phyi rol gyi khyams la rim pa dang po dang
T02D2627:251b-46: gnyis pa dang gsum pa la rdo rje la sogs
T02D2627:251b-47: pa dang / par bu dang gseg shang dang /
T02D2627:251b-49: sgo rnams la khro bo'i phyag mtshan rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2627:251b-50: 'jig rten gtso dang ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2627:251b-51: rnams kyi thig le dang ming du bri bar bya'o
T02D2627:252a-0: @252a * // yang bya dang bum pa gang ba dang /
T02D2627:252a-1: gtor ma'i snod rnams bkang ba brgyad dam bcu drug
T02D2627:252a-2: snyed dag gzhag bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bshos dang
T02D2627:252a-3: / me tog gi phreng ba dang /

T02D2627:252a-6: dkyil 'khor dam par sbyin sreg gi phyir gzhag pa yin no //

T02D2627:252a-8: lha rnams mang po spyan drangs pa //

T02D2627:252a-10: thugs kyi rang bzhin ston cing dngos po mtshan ma bsreg pa ni thugs gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2627:252a-11: kyang zhes bya ba ni lhag chad zhi ba sngon du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang /

T02D2627:252a-13: lha rnams mang po spyan drangs ba ni /
T02D2627:252a-14: bsdu zhing lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya'o //
T02D2627:252a-15: sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgya //
T02D2627:252a-16: aargham phul ba shes bas kyang //

T02D2627:252a-20: mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni //

T02D2627:252a-22: lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la //
T02D2627:252a-24: lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D2627:252a-25: de ltar sbyin sreg gi tshe na lha rnams mchod nas rdzas bstan pa'i phyir /

T02D2627:252a-28: nas dang yungs kar 'bras rnams la //
T02D2627:252a-29: dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste //
T02D2627:252a-30: 'bras chan spod dang la du dang //
T02D2627:252a-31: sbrang rtsi kha rar ldan de bzhin //
T02D2627:252a-32: brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la //
T02D2627:252a-33: yam shing la yang de bzhin te //
T02D2627:252a-34: rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing //
T02D2627:252a-35: khung bu'i nang du gzhug bar bya //
T02D2627:252a-36: zhes bya ba la rdzas de rnams kun la aom sarbba bid ces bya ba nas /
T02D2627:252a-37: bha zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sngags brgya phrag du mar bzlas shing /
T02D2627:252a-38: sngags de nyid btab pa'i shing la bha dang sha
T02D2627:252a-39: bkod pa mchod rten gyi dbus su brtsig bar bya
T02D2627:252a-40: ba'i don to // ro'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /

T02D2627:252a-42: bye ma dang nyungs kar gyis sbyangs te khrus byas la /

T02D2627:253a-36: phyag rgya dgrol de gshegs nas me lha mchod de

T02D2627:253a-38: // de ltar mchod pa bya ba bstan nas thal ba'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /

T02D2627:253a-44: sngags kyis btab ba'i dri chu dang //

T02D2627:253b-0: sbyong ba'i @253b sngags kyi blo ldan gyis //

T02D2627:253b-23: de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang //
T02D2627:253b-24: mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas //

T02D2627:254a-9: zhes bya ba thal ba dang nyungs kar dang /

T02D2627:254a-22: mi grol bar dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed par

T02D2627:254a-26: de ltar thabs brgyad ston to //

T02D2627:254a-31: te dga' ldan du skyes nas grags pa chen po'i
T02D2627:254a-32: lha dang bcas bas de bzhin gshegs pa la tshe
T02D2627:254a-33: 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de /

T02D2627:254a-43: bla ma gnyis ma gtogs pa zil gyis mnan nas ched du brjod do //

T02D2627:254b-0: bsam yas brjod nas lta @254b bar 'tshal zhus pa
T02D2627:254b-1: dang bla ma'i 'od kyis snying bskul te 'od mi
T02D2627:254b-3: bla ma gnyis ma gtogs pa thams cad g-yos te ngo mtshar che ba'i don zhus pa /
T02D2627:254b-4: khyad par lnga'i mchod pas mchod de mi snang bar gyur te zhes bya ba ste /

T02D2627:254b-11: pa'i sku la sogs pa'i gtso bor gyur pa bstan
T02D2627:254b-12: bstan / pa'o // ci'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud du mdzad ce na /
T02D2627:254b-13: lha thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02D2627:254b-18: rtsa bar dang por ston pa dang ldan pas na rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya'o //
T02D2627:254b-20: gsang ba lnga ldan gang yin pa //
T02D2627:254b-21: dang po nyid du bstan pas na //

T02D2627:254b-24: ci'i phyir rgyud ces brjod ce na //

T02D2627:254b-27: zhes gsungs pas rgyun chags pa'am /
T02D2627:254b-29: de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2627:254b-30: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud phyi ma ston te ;
T02D2627:254b-31: ci'i phyir phyi ma zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2627:254b-32: snga ma las byung zhing de nyid gsung ba spas
T02D2627:254b-33: pa shes pa'i phyir rgyud phyi ma zhes brjod par

T02D2627:254b-35: phyi ma snga ma las byung ste //
T02D2627:254b-36: de nyid gsungs pa sbas shes pa //
T02D2627:254b-37: rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin //

T02D2627:254b-40: mi'i yul du bab pa la sogs pa la khyad par ma bshad pa dang /
T02D2627:254b-41: phyis 'dzam bu gling gi ris 'di nyid na zhes gsungs pa ni /
T02D2627:254b-42: ri rab kyi lho phyogs la dgongs pa dang /
T02D2627:254b-43: yang phyis ming dang rjes yi rang ngo zhes bya ba gsungs pa ni ;
T02D2627:254b-44: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa

T02D2627:254b-47: la la dag gnas gang du 'chad pa de dag gis bshad pa'i lung brjod dgos te /
T02D2627:254b-48: lung med pa kho na nyid yin te /

T02D2627:255a-1: shin tu lkog tu gyur ba'i phyir mi 'thad pa nyid do //

T02D2627:255a-3: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtsa
T02D2627:255a-4: ba'i rgyud du bshad pa las phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2627:255a-5: sngar bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang bcas
T02D2627:255a-6: pa'o // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
T02D2627:255a-7: dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba
T02D2627:255a-8: pa'o // ni / ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse

T02D2627:255a-16: brtag pa'i rgyal po phyi ma 'di //
T02D2627:255a-18: brtag pa'i rgyal po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T02D2627:255a-19: byang chub kyi sems dang bcas ba yin la de

T02D2627:255a-33: dpa' bo gdan la bzhengs nas kyang //

T02D2627:255a-38: gtso bo la gus pas zla ba dang padma'i gdan
T02D2627:255a-39: rang dang 'tsham pa las bzhengs nas byin gyis brlabs
T02D2627:255a-40: pas dgyes shing bgegs zhi ba dang /
T02D2627:255a-41: bar chod kyis mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje bsor nas kyang /
T02D2627:255a-42: sh'akya'i bdag po sems can gyi don la dgyes par
T02D2627:255a-43: mdzad pa thub pa'i gtsol phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya
T02D2627:255a-44: ba'i don to // 'dis ni gsang sngags kyi sgo'i

T02D2627:255a-46: byas nas gnang ba thob nas 'jug pa bya'o zhes
T02D2627:255b-0: sgrib pa thams @255b cad rnam par dag pa rdo
T02D2627:255b-1: rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

T02D2627:271a-0: byang phyogs su khro bo ste krum @271a * //
T02D2627:271a-1: zhes bya ba'i snying pos so //
T02D2627:271a-2: lho phyogs su nam mkha' snying po'i snying po ste /
T02D2627:271a-3: tram zhes bya ba'i snying pos so //
T02D2627:271a-4: nub phyogs su spyan ras gzigs te hri zhes bya ba'i snying pos so //
T02D2627:271a-5: kun gyi 'od la aom pu n+ye zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rig pa bri'o //
T02D2627:271a-6: dbang bskur ba'i bum pa lnga dang /
T02D2627:271a-7: mchod pa'i bum pa brgyad dang /
T02D2627:271a-8: tram zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi bzlas brjod byas te gzhag go //
T02D2627:271a-9: bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod rdzas kun la /
T02D2627:271a-10: krum zhes bya ba'i bzlas pas gzhag /
T02D2627:271a-11: gzhan yang mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad dang sgo ba bzhi snga ma bzhin du bri'o //
T02D2627:271a-13: dgongs ka'i dus la bab pa dang //
T02D2627:271a-14: zhes bya ba ni de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid
T02D2627:271a-15: zhugs la bde bar gshegs pa sras dang 'bangs su
T02D2627:271a-16: bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te rig pa dang lhan
T02D2627:271a-18: de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te //
T02D2627:271a-19: skyil krung bcas te 'dug la stong phrag brgyar bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'am rdo rje 'dzin pa'am /
T02D2627:271a-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung
T02D2627:271a-21: ste mngon sum du mthong nas 'dod pa'i mtshan ma
T02D2627:271a-23: ci ste mnyam par ma bzhag na yid kyis thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2627:271a-24: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2627:271a-29: ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya ma ti kra
T02D2627:271a-30: ma tha ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya dh'a
T02D2627:271a-31: ra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bskyed
T02D2627:271a-32: la zhes bya ba ni sngags pa nyid zhugs la
T02D2627:271a-33: lhag chad zhi bar byas nas ting nge 'dzin gsum
T02D2627:271a-34: sngon du 'gro bas sgo phye ste /
T02D2627:271a-35: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo //
T02D2627:271a-36: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya /
T02D2627:271a-42: sbyin sreg dang gnang ba nong pa'i bar du bya'o //
T02D2627:271a-43: de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs te /
T02D2627:271a-44: bdag nyid dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig bskur nas /
T02D2627:271a-45: skyil krung bcas nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2627:271a-46: pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mngon
T02D2627:271a-47: sum du mthong nas 'bras bu mchog thob po //
T02D2627:271b-0: bzlas brjod ma byas kyang yid kyis las thams cad byed nus bar @271b 'gyur ro //
T02D2627:271b-1: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2627:271b-2: rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba'am /
T02D2627:271b-5: khro bo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jug pa ni
T02D2627:271b-6: nga yin zhes nga rgyal bskyed la zhes bya ba'i
T02D2627:271b-7: don to // de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par
T02D2627:271b-8: bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug
T02D2627:271b-9: pa la sogs pa ston te de yang rtsa ba'i
T02D2627:271b-10: rgyud du bshad pa bzhin du ye shes dbab pa'i
T02D2627:271b-11: mthar thug pa byas la 'dir me tog dor bar
T02D2627:271b-12: don to // bya'o // aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra t'i tstsha ho sa ma ya stv'am /
T02D2627:271b-13: de nyid brjod la mgo la bcings gdong g-yogs dgrol //
T02D2627:271b-14: lha ngo bstan 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snying gar bstan /
T02D2627:271b-15: dbang bskur bar bya ste snga ma bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgor ba zhag la /
T02D2627:271b-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa badzra dh'a tu aa dzny'a h'um bhr'um /
T02D2627:271b-17: zhes bya ba dang gtso bo'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2627:271b-18: aom badzra badzra aabhi shinytsa h'um h'um /
T02D2627:271b-19: zhes byas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2627:271b-20: aom ratna aa bhi shinytsa h'um tram /
T02D2627:271b-21: zhes bya bas nam mkha'i snying po'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2627:271b-22: aom padma aa bhe shinytsa h'um hr'i:/
T02D2627:271b-23: zhes pas spyan ras gzigs kyi bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2627:271b-24: de nas karma aa bhi shinytsa h'um krum zhes bya ba dang khro bo'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2627:271b-25: dbang lhag ma nyi shus kyang dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2627:271b-26: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin no //
T02D2627:271b-27: dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub kyi sems dang bla ma mi spang ngo //
T02D2627:271b-28: srog chags mi gsad ma byin par mi blang /
T02D2627:271b-29: brdzun du smra bar mi bya /
T02D2627:271b-30: gzhan gyi bud med la mi spyad //
T02D2627:271b-31: bla ma'i grib ma la mi 'gom //
T02D2627:271b-32: slob dpon du yon tan can ma yin pa mi gzung /
T02D2627:271b-33: slob dpon gyi mtshan nas mi brjod /
T02D2627:271b-34: sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha la mi smad gal
T02D2627:271b-35: te glen pas smad na nad kyis thebs nas 'chi
T02D2627:271b-36: bar 'gyur ro // snying po dang lha'i grib ma dang phyag rgya dang gom bas mi 'gom /
T02D2627:271b-37: dkon mchog gsum dang bstan pa la gnod pa dang
T02D2627:271b-38: bla ma la smod pa rnams ngan sngags kyis gsad
T02D2627:271b-39: par bya'o // log par lta ba dang sdig pa
T02D2627:271b-40: spyod pa dang sems can la gnod pa dang dam
T02D2627:271b-41: tshig la sdang ba rnams snying rje chen pos ngan
T02D2627:272a-1: pa can gyi nor blangs la //
T02D2627:272a-2: phongs pa rnams la sbyin par bya //

T02D2627:272a-4: dam tshig bsgrub pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2627:272a-6: dam tshig can la phan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2627:272a-7: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la mchod pa'i phyir du 'jungs pa rnams kyi nor da brog go //
T02D2627:272a-8: sems can la phan par 'dod pas bla ma'i nor dang /
T02D2627:272a-9: srog chags kyi srog bsrung ba'i phyir brdzun du smra bar bya'o //
T02D2627:272a-10: sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig srung
T02D2627:272a-11: ba dang bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhan gyi bud med bsten
T02D2627:272a-12: par bya'o // de dag kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2627:272a-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas thams
T02D2627:272a-14: cad spyad cing bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur te mnyes
T02D2627:272a-16: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:272a-17: de nas bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2627:272a-18: de nas las kyi rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2627:272a-19: dbang bskur ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du bstan pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2627:272a-20: de nas bla ma la lus dang nor dang dbyig
T02D2627:272a-21: dang 'bru dang stan dang bran dang khang pa dang
T02D2627:272a-22: rgyal po yin na rgyal srid dang bu dang bu
T02D2627:272a-23: mo dang chung ma dang ma dang sring mo dang
T02D2627:272a-24: tsha bo dang / gzhan yang ci bzhed pa thams
T02D2627:272a-25: cad rang la phan pa'i phyir bla ma la dbul
T02D2627:272a-26: lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:272a-27: de nas byang chub bar du ni //
T02D2627:272a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub ston te /
T02D2627:272a-29: 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa de
T02D2627:272a-30: nas byang chub thob pa'i bar du sangs rgyas nyid
T02D2627:272a-31: dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2627:272a-32: mthu chen rnams sgrub par 'dod pas slob dpon la
T02D2627:272a-33: dngos grub rnams gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D2627:272a-34: de nas slob ma la phan pa'i phyir slob dpon
T02D2627:272a-35: ser sna med cing sems dad pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D2627:272a-36: slob ma la dngos grub rnams sbyin par bya'o zhes
T02D2627:272a-39: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par //
T02D2627:272a-40: sems kyis bsgom pa byas nas kyang //
T02D2627:272a-41: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D2627:272a-42: rang gi sa bon de dbus su //
T02D2627:272a-43: bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya dag / bsams shing de bzhin de nyid du //
T02D2627:272a-44: sgrub pa yis ni bsgyur bar bya //
T02D2627:272a-45: lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur /
T02D2627:272b-0: @272b de nas rang gi sa bon dang //
T02D2627:272b-1: phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlab //
T02D2627:272b-2: lag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D2627:272b-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2627:272b-4: de nas nga rgyal bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2627:272b-6: chos rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni mtshan nyid
T02D2627:272b-7: 'dzin pas na chos te dngos po thams cad do
T02D2627:272b-8: // dngos po med par zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang bral bas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2627:272b-9: rgyu dang bral ba de yang rgyu yod pa las
T02D2627:272b-10: skye'am med pa las skye'am gnyi ga las skye zhe
T02D2627:272b-11: na / ci dang por yod pa las ma yin
T02D2627:272b-12: te ngo bo nyid yongs su grub zin pa ni
T02D2627:272b-13: ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzhan du skye ba don du
T02D2627:272b-14: na / mi rigs so // gzhan du gal te
T02D2627:272b-15: yod pa skye bar 'gyur ba ni skyes zin pa'ang
T02D2627:272b-17: med pa las kyang mi skye ste shin tu gzugs
T02D2627:272b-18: med pa'i ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dang
T02D2627:272b-19: 'dra zhing skye bar 'jug pa dang mi ldan pa'i
T02D2627:272b-20: phyir ro // gzhan du 'di dag thams cad med
T02D2627:272b-21: par 'gyur zhing gang gi phyir dngos po'i phyogs gang
T02D2627:272b-22: yang rung ba 'ga' zhig las kyang dngos po thams
T02D2627:272b-23: cad rtag tu skye bar thal bar 'gyur bas rgyu
T02D2627:272b-24: dang 'bras bu nges pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2627:272b-25: gal te so so'i nus pa nges par mi 'gyur
T02D2627:272b-26: bar dngos po 'di rnams kyi nus pa so sor
T02D2627:272b-27: nges par gyur na ni dngos po de rnams las
T02D2627:272b-28: cung zad cig skye bar 'gyur bas khyad par med
T02D2627:272b-29: pas kyang thams cad med pa yin no zhe na
T02D2627:272b-30: / de ni mi rigs te 'bras bu rnams dang
T02D2627:272b-31: 'dres pa'i gzugs rnams rkyen du gyur na ni de'i
T02D2627:272b-32: tshe de rnams kyis so sor nges pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2627:272b-33: dang 'brel par 'gyur bas 'bras bu gang zhig la
T02D2627:272b-35: de lta na nus pa nges pa med pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2627:272b-36: de bas na thams cad las thams cad skye bar
T02D2627:272b-37: thal bar 'gyur bas bzlog dka' bar 'gyur ba dang
T02D2627:272b-38: yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs su smras pa'i nyes
T02D2627:272b-40: gnyi ga las kyang mi skye ste gcig la ngo bo nyid gnyis su 'gyur ba med de /
T02D2627:272b-41: gcig pa nyid dang gnyis pa nyid ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir de yang /
T02D2627:272b-42: yod dang med pa'i don la yang //
T02D2627:272b-43: rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te //
T02D2627:272b-44: yod na rkyen gyis ci zhig bya //
T02D2627:272b-45: med na gang gi rkyen du 'gyur //
T02D2627:273a-2: med dang yod min mi sgrub pa //
T02D2627:273a-3: ji ltar sgrub byed rgyu zhes bya //
T02D2627:273a-4: de ltar yin na mi rigs so //
T02D2627:273a-5: rkyen rnams so so 'dus pa las //
T02D2627:273a-6: 'bras bu de ni med pa nyid //
T02D2627:273a-7: rkyen rnams las ni gang med pa //
T02D2627:273a-8: de ni rkyen gyis ji ltar skyed //
T02D2627:273a-9: ci ste de ni med par yang //
T02D2627:273a-10: rkyen de dag las skye 'gyur na //
T02D2627:273a-11: rkyen dag las kyang 'bras bu ni //
T02D2627:273a-12: ci yi phyir na skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2627:273a-14: sems kyi bsgom pa byas nas kyang //
T02D2627:273a-15: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du don bsgom zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2627:273a-16: snga ma las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhes bya

T02D2627:273a-27: zhes bya ba ni de nyid las lha'i sku rdzogs pa'o //

T02D2627:273a-30: ces bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa rang gi sa bon /
T02D2627:273a-31: aom sarba bid badzra aadhi tishtha dzny'a na sa ma
T02D2627:273a-32: ye h'um zhes bya ba dang phyag rgya gnyis bcings
T02D2627:273a-33: te / snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas bco brgyad du byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2627:273a-34: lhag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D2627:273a-35: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2627:273a-36: zhes bya ba ni snying gar dkyil 'khor gzhan du
T02D2627:273a-37: sprul te zhugs nas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas lnga'i
T02D2627:273a-38: dbu rgyan ngang / ngar dpyangs dang /
T02D2627:273a-42: brtul zhugs sbyin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:273a-43: de nas nga rgyal bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2627:273a-44: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang chos dang las
T02D2627:273a-45: dang phyag rgya chen po la sogs pas rgyas btab
T02D2627:273a-46: nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:273a-47: kyang zhes bya ba ni mchod pa bsdu'o //
T02D2627:273a-48: 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02D2627:273a-49: rigs rnams kyi zlos pa pos khrus kyi cho ga
T02D2627:273a-50: sngon du 'gro ba las lha la sogs pa mchod
T02D2627:273a-51: de mi snang bar gyur bar byas la dang po
T02D2627:273a-52: chos thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas stong
T02D2627:273b-1: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2627:273b-3: sa bon las dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang de
T02D2627:273b-4: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer
T02D2627:273b-5: zhugs pa dang gzugs nyid rdzogs par byed pa dang
T02D2627:273b-6: / rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te sngags brjod la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2627:273b-7: snying gar sprul te 'jug pa dang /
T02D2627:273b-8: dbang rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang rgyas gdab pa
T02D2627:273b-9: dang mchod pa yang bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2627:273b-10: // mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub byas na //
T02D2627:273b-11: zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa dang mtshan thog thag tu bsgoms nas zhes bya ba'i don to//
T02D2627:273b-14: dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos //
T02D2627:273b-16: 'dis ni rtog pa thams cad kyi dam tshig sems
T02D2627:273b-17: dpa' bskyed pa dang dngos grub kyi cho ga ston
T02D2627:273b-18: to // de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha
T02D2627:273b-19: chen po rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2627:273b-20: dkyil 'khor 'dir gzhug pa'i phan yon bstan te go
T02D2627:273b-22: de nas lha de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la
T02D2627:273b-23: sogs pas dbang bskur ba dang bzlas brjod ston te
T02D2627:273b-24: / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhus pa'i don tshe thung ba dang /
T02D2627:273b-25: ngan song du skyes par 'gyur ba ma mchis na ji ltar bsgrub ces zhus pa dang /
T02D2627:273b-26: lhan du dkyil 'khor du chug cig / chos kyi
T02D2627:273b-27: yi ge zlos su chu gcig / de tshe ring
T02D2627:273b-28: bar 'gyur / bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur /
T02D2627:273b-29: ngan song las grol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2627:273b-30: tshe 'di la gnas pa'i don bshad nas /
T02D2627:273b-31: pha rol tu 'phos pa rnams kyi don du ngan
T02D2627:273b-32: song du skyes zin pa rnams ming la sogs pa
T02D2627:273b-33: la bkug la lan bdun du dkyil 'khor du bcug
T02D2627:273b-34: la dbang bskur na ngan song las rnam par grol
T02D2627:273b-35: bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2627:273b-36: shi ba'i ming nas smos te sngar bshad pa'i rig
T02D2627:273b-37: pa'i rgyud nyid 'bum phrag stong gi bar du bzlas
T02D2627:273b-38: brjod byas pa la yang kha dog du klog pa'i
T02D2627:273b-40: mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa yang 'byang bar
T02D2627:273b-41: 'gyur na sdig pa chung du lta smos kyang ci
T02D2627:273b-42: dgos zhes phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2627:274a-0: lha'i bu rnams zhi ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngan @274a * //
T02D2627:274a-1: song du skyes zin pa rnams sbyang ba ston te
T02D2627:274a-2: zhi ba'i hom khung tha ma khru gang bar ma
T02D2627:274a-3: khru do mchog khru bzhi pa zlum po nyid du
T02D2627:274a-4: byas nas ming dang sngags spel te nyungs kar gyis
T02D2627:274a-5: brgya phrag stong du sbyin sreg byas na ngan song
T02D2627:274a-7: de'i sha dang rus pa dang skra dang thal ba
T02D2627:274a-8: dang gzugs brnyan la sogs pas brgya phrag stong du
T02D2627:274a-9: sbyin sreg byas na yang ngan song las thar bar
T02D2627:274a-10: 'gyur ro // thab khung la sogs pa la ci zhig bri zhe na /
T02D2627:274a-11: de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang 'od zer dkar po bri //
T02D2627:274a-12: 'khor yug la rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dkar po bri /
T02D2627:274a-13: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la
T02D2627:274a-14: shar phyogs su rdo rje gzhag / byang du rgya
T02D2627:274a-15: gram / lho phyogs su rdo rje rin chen /

T02D2627:275a-42: aom badzra h'um aa rgya gram bsnams pa'o //

T02D2627:289b-39: kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas dga' ba dang
T02D2627:290a-2: de yang gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par
T02D2627:290a-3: 'dod pa rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo zhing
T02D2627:290a-5: sprul pa'i tshogs lus la bsdus la sprul pa bya
T02D2627:290a-6: ba nas ci bder gnas so zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2627:290a-7: to // bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa dang /
T02D2627:290a-8: des byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2627:290a-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2627:290a-10: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D2627:290a-13: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor rnams dang /
T02D2627:290a-14: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri za
T02D2627:290a-15: dang gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa zhes
T02D2627:290a-16: bya ba ni ming zhes bya ba yang shas che
T02D2627:290a-17: ba ste / rdzu 'phrul la brten pa'o //
T02D2627:290a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'
T02D2627:290a-19: ste rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba 'bras
T02D2627:290a-20: bu thob pas mngon par dga' ste /
T02D2627:290a-21: rgyud sprul pas bshad pa la rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D2627:290a-22: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid
T02D2627:290a-23: kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa zhes bya ba sngar bshad
T02D2627:290a-24: pa bzhin no // phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang /
T02D2627:290a-26: rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa las le'u 'di
T02D2627:290a-27: phyogs gcig tu byas sheng dum bur bkol ba las
T02D2627:290a-28: 'dir 'dus par bstan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2627:290a-29: / ngan song rnam par sbyong byed pa'i //
T02D2627:290a-30: gzi brjid rgyal po snang brtsams pas //
T02D2627:290a-31: dge ba bdag gis ci bsags pa //
T02D2627:290a-32: 'gro kun ngan song rnams sbyangs te //
T02D2627:290a-33: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gyur cig / ngan song
T02D2627:290a-34: thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal
T02D2627:290a-35: po brtag pa snang ba'i rkyan zhes bya ba rdzogs
T02D2627:290a-37: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bidya ka ra barma dang /
T02D2627:290a-38: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dbang phyug
T02D2627:290a-39: rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
